column4: I have ubuntu 8.04 on a hard drive. I think it's file system 3?? I have the option to automatically update it but I'm puzzled how the file system will be affected? Don't I have to manually format the drive or something. So what happens if I automatically update to say 10.04?
server? no I don't think so
did you mean I could use 8.04 as a server?
